alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:35AM PST until December 24 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Icy and snow covered roads are possible in the mountain terrain...particularly Westgard Pass and White Mountain Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snowfall is possible over the weekend along with lower snow levels.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
